# simd_smoothstep(_:_:_:)

**Function**

Returns an elementwise smoothly interpolated value between two vectors.

## Declaration

```swift
func simd_smoothstep(_ edge0: simd_double8, _ edge1: simd_double8, _ x: simd_double8) -> simd_double8
```

## Interpolation Functions

- **simd_mix(_:_:_:)**: Returns an elementwise linearly interpolated value between two vectors.
